name: JAGARAN
briefDescription: JAGARAN is a non-profit making, non-political, secular and a Non-Government Organisation working for the poor and marginalised people of Odisha. Founded by a group young social activists of Bandhakatia Gram Panchayat of Cuttack district in the name of Mahila Jagaran Parishad got registered under Society Registration Act, 1860 of XXI bearingRegistration No. 16668/172/2002-03 of dt.5.09.2002 at Additional Registration Society, Office of the District Magistrate and Collector, Cuttack. After having 8 year experience of work, members felt the need to expand the horizon of their thought on development. The objectives were than revised and making it more broad empowerment of marginalized and backward communities was added. Accordingly the name was also changed to JAGARAN and once again registered under the Society Registration Act, 1860 of XXI bearing registration No. 23130/137/2009-10 on dt.04.03.2010 in the office of the Register of Society, IGR,Cuttack. The organization started its operation in Cuttack district has extended its activities to neighbouring districts like Kendrapara,Balasore and Khurda.
